Bash(.venvScriptspython.exe -c "
import feedparser

# Monetary Matters with Jack Farley
print\(''=== Monetary Matters with Jack Farley ===''\)
feed1 = feedparser.parse\(''https://feeds.megaphone.fm/EWWMN1909747317''\)
for entry in feed1.entries[:10]:
    if hasattr\(entry, ''published''\):
        print\(f""Date: {entry.published[:16]} - Title: {entry.get\(''title'', ''No title''\)[:80]}""\)
        if ''Citrin'' in entry.get\(''title'', ''''\) or ''citrin'' in entry.get\(''title'', ''''\).lower\(\):
            print\(f""  AUDIO: {[e.get\(''href'', ''''\) for e in entry.get\(''enclosures'', []\)][0] if entry.get\(''enclosures''\) else ''No audio''}""\)
")

Bash(".venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "import feedparser; feed1 = feedparser.parse\(''https://feeds.megaphone.fm/EWWMN1909747317''\); print\(''=== Monetary Matters ===''\); [print\(f""Date: {e.published[:16] if hasattr\(e, ''published''\) else ''N/A''} - {e.get\(''title'', ''No title''\)[:70]}""\) for e in feed1.entries[:15]]")

Bash(".venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
import feedparser

# Episode 1: Monetary Matters - Citrini
print\(''=== EPISODE 1: Monetary Matters with Jack Farley ===''\)
feed1 = feedparser.parse\(''https://feeds.megaphone.fm/EWWMN1909747317''\)
for entry in feed1.entries:
    if ''Citrini'' in entry.get\(''title'', ''''\):
        print\(f""Title: {entry.get\(''title''\)}""\)
        print\(f""Date: {entry.published if hasattr\(entry, ''published''\) else ''N/A''}""\)
        audio = entry.get\(''enclosures'', []\)
        if audio:
            print\(f""Audio: {audio[0].get\(''href'', ''''\)}""\)
        break

# Episode 2: The Real Eisman Playbook - Jan 9
print\(''\\n=== EPISODE 2: The Real Eisman Playbook ===''\)
feed2 = feedparser.parse\(''https://feeds.megaphone.fm/GBLL9435201326''\)
for entry in feed2.entries[:20]:
    if hasattr\(entry, ''published''\) and ''Jan'' in entry.published and \(''9'' in entry.published or ''09'' in entry.published\):
        print\(f""Title: {entry.get\(''title''\)}""\)
        print\(f""Date: {entry.published}""\)
        audio = entry.get\(''enclosures'', []\)
        if audio:
            print\(f""Audio: {audio[0].get\(''href'', ''''\)}""\)
        break
")

Bash(".venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
import feedparser

# Episode 3: Transistor Radio - Jan 7
print\(''=== EPISODE 3: Transistor Radio ===''\)
feed3 = feedparser.parse\(''https://anchor.fm/s/7b86e554/podcast/rss''\)
for entry in feed3.entries[:20]:
    if hasattr\(entry, ''published''\) and ''Jan'' in entry.published and \(''7'' in entry.published or ''07'' in entry.published\):
        print\(f""Title: {entry.get\(''title''\)}""\)
        print\(f""Date: {entry.published}""\)
        audio = entry.get\(''enclosures'', []\)
        if audio:
            print\(f""Audio: {audio[0].get\(''href'', ''''\)}""\)
        break
")

Bash(".venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
import feedparser

# ChinaTalk - recent episodes
print\(''=== EPISODE 3: ChinaTalk ===''\)
feed = feedparser.parse\(''https://feeds.megaphone.fm/CHTAL4990341033''\)
for i, entry in enumerate\(feed.entries[:10]\):
    print\(f""{i+1}. Date: {entry.published if hasattr\(entry, ''published''\) else ''N/A''}""\)
    print\(f""   Title: {entry.get\(''title''\)[:80]}""\)
    print\(\)
")

Bash(".venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
from openai import OpenAI
from utils import load_env_vars

config = load_env_vars\(\)
print\(''Testing Deep Infra Whisper API...''\)
print\(f''API Key: {config[""deep_infra_key""][:10]}...''\)
print\(f''Model: {config[""transcription_model""]}''\)

client = OpenAI\(
    api_key=config[''deep_infra_key''],
    base_url=''https://api.deepinfra.com/v1/openai''
\)

# Test with a tiny audio file - just create a dummy test
print\(''API client created successfully''\)
print\(''Note: Need actual audio file to test transcription''\)
")

Bash(".venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
from utils import load_env_vars
config = load_env_vars\(\)
print\(''OPENROUTER_API_KEY set:'', bool\(config[''openrouter_key'']\)\)
print\(''Key starts with:'', config[''openrouter_key''][:10] if config[''openrouter_key''] else ''None''\)
print\(''Summary model:'', config[''summary_model'']\)
print\(''OpenRouter URL:'', config[''openrouter_url'']\)
")

Bash(".venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
from openai import OpenAI
from utils import load_env_vars

config = load_env_vars\(\)
print\(''Testing OpenRouter API...''\)
print\(''API Key:'', config[''openrouter_key''][:20] + ''...''\)

client = OpenAI\(
  base_url=''https://openrouter.ai/api/v1'',
  api_key=config[''openrouter_key'']
\)

try:
    response = client.chat.completions.create\(
      model=''nvidia/nemotron-3-nano-30b-a3b:free'',
      messages=[
        {
          ''role'': ''user'',
          ''content'': ''How many r''\\''''s are in the word ''\\''''strawberry''\\''''?''
        }
      ]
    \)
    print\(''Success! Response:'', response.choices[0].message.content\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''Error: {type\(e\).__name__}: {e}''\)
")

from openai import OpenAI

print\(''Testing OpenRouter API...''\)
print\(''API Key:'', config[''openrouter_key''][:20] + ''...''\)

client = OpenAI\(
  base_url=''https://openrouter.ai/api/v1'',

\)

try:

          ''content'': ''Say hello world''
        }
      ]

")
